entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
